data.meta_description:
The International Union of Pure and Applied Physics (IUPAP) Commission on Magnetism (C9) has selected the 2024 winners for the 

🥇 Magnetism Award and Néel…
data.text:
#MMM2023 📢 Check out the published papers from MMM 2023! 👉 Next stop: The 16th Joint Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials and Intermag 📍 Hyatt Regency New Orleans, New Orleans, Louisiana, USA - January 13–17, 2025

📢 The 16th Joint Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials and Intermag is extending the deadline for abstract submissions! 📅 New Deadline: 11:59 pm ET on July 23 📍 Hyatt Regency New Orleans, New Orleans, Louisiana, USA 🗓️ Conference Dates: January 13–17, 2025 More info https://buff.ly/4cp1FYY Don’t miss this opportunity to present your research at the 2025 Joint MMM-Intermag Conference! Submit your abstract now and join us in the vibrant city of New Orleans. #Joint2025 #Magnetism #MagnetismCommunity

🎬 New video ❗ IEEE Magnetics Society Oral History Project Diane Melton – The Lady Behind the Scenes Video and introduction 👉 https://buff.ly/4bQVbBd She served as the Executive Director of the IEEE Magnetics Society for decades. Hear her accounts of how MMM/Intermag and MagSoc have evolved over the years, fun facts and surprises, most memorable experiences, and her advice to newcomers.

📢 AtC-AtG - The abstract submission is now open ! Submission deadline : August 2, 2024 ❗ IEEE Around-the-Clock Around-the-Globe Magnetics Conference (AtC-AtG) 2024 To go to abstract submission form 👉 https://buff.ly/46ccXNV To get more information for AtC-AtG 2024 👉https://buff.ly/3CxLGrb Registration is free and open until September 25, 2024 👉 https://buff.ly/4d1aqs5

📢 Call for Nominations: IEEE Magnetics Society Awards by July 31, 2024 ❗ Nominations for the IEEE Magnetics Society Awards are now open for the following categories: ✔️ Early Career Award 👉 https://buff.ly/3ybEIJm ✔️ Mid-Career Award 👉 https://buff.ly/3UmqVXV ✔️ Distinguished Service Award 👉 https://buff.ly/49WLaBv ✔️ Achievement Award 👉 https://buff.ly/4bh3Gp8 We are waiting for your nominations ❗

📢 Attention: The next edition of the Virtual Coffee Hour will feature 2024 Distinguished Lecturer, Prof. Kerem Camsari! ☕️✨ Students in Magnetism (SiM) organize VCH in their virtual headquarters in gathertown. The new format includes guests, who will join for sessions of networking, self-development, skills-building, and, of course, our flagship fun! 🗓️13 July 2024 UTC 2PM "Probabilistic Computing with p-bits: An Interdisciplinary Research Program" Prof Kerem Camsari, University of California, Santa Barbara, US More information➡️https://buff.ly/45LTn9R #SiMplygoodcoffee #StudentsInMagnetism

📢 The abstract submission site for the #Joint2025 is now open! ⚠️ Deadline is July 19, 2024 This year, there is the option for early decisions for visa applications‼️ Do not wait! Submit your abstract now! More info➡️ https://buff.ly/4cp1FYY

📢 Deadline Extended: Nominations for 2025 Distinguished Lecturers (DLs) ❗ ✔️ The new deadline is June 24, 2024. Nomination form 👉 https://buff.ly/3MUkffZ More info👉https://buff.ly/4djaMLF These DLs deliver a minimum of 20-40 lectures over the globe during their year upon invitation by individual institutions or chapters, most of which cover local costs. More info for DLs👉https://buff.ly/43Ct3Oq
